attributes.action: Remove Peter Mandelson from all forms of government unless he is duly elected.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Peter Mandelson was sacked from Blairs government in disgrace for lying on mortgage forms, similar to the MP' expenses scandal. How can he now be in the cabinet helping make policy decisions without having a peoples mandate from the ballot box.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
